content: **drops crochet slippers in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** eu 35/37 - 38/40 42/44 us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 10/12 uk 3/4 - 5/6½ - 7½/9½ foot length 22 - 25 - 28 cm / 8 ¾ -9 ¾ -11 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 150 g for all sizes color no 26 rose and use drops vienna from garnstudio a remnant of color no 28 cerise drops crochet hook size 8 mm / us l/11 - or size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge drops crochet hook size 6 mm / us j/10 for flower
